#Welcome in Natao

 Before going further, I need some informations to know you better
SETTING_MESSAGE_DATABASE: Your database file to start, a good advice is to have it in your Dropbox
SETTING_MESSAGE_NAME: I also need your first name and your name

SETTING_MESSAGE_DONE: And that's it, we can start after you click on the upper left button
